SELECT review.review_seq, review.review_user_seq, users.user_nickname, restaurant.restaurant_seq, restaurant.restaurant_title, review_image.review_image_seq, LEFT(review.review_content, 20) AS review_content, review.review_created_time, review.review_star FROM review JOIN users ON (review.review_user_seq = users.user_seq) JOIN restaurant USING (restaurant_seq) LEFT JOIN review_image USING (review_seq) WHERE review.review_status = 'active'
AND users.user_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userNickname}, '%')
AND review.review_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reviewContent}, '%')
AND restaurant.restaurant_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{restaurantTitle}, '%')
GROUP BY review.review_seq ORDER BY review.review_created_time DESC LIMIT #{limit} OFFSET #{offset}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM review JOIN users ON (review.review_user_seq = users.user_seq) JOIN restaurant USING (restaurant_seq) WHERE review.review_status = 'active'
AND users.user_nickname LIKE CONCAT('%', #{userNickname}, '%')
AND review.review_content LIKE CONCAT('%', #{reviewContent}, '%')
AND restaurant.restaurant_title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{restaurantTitle}, '%')

SELECT review.review_seq, review.review_user_seq, users.user_nickname, restaurant.restaurant_seq, restaurant.restaurant_title, review.review_content, review.review_created_time, review.review_updated_time, review.review_star FROM review JOIN users ON (review.review_user_seq = users.user_seq) JOIN restaurant USING (restaurant_seq) WHERE review.review_status = 'active' AND review.review_seq = #{reviewSeq}
SELECT review_image_path FROM review JOIN review_image USING (review_seq) WHERE review.review_status = 'active' AND review.review_seq = #{reviewSeq}
SELECT FORMAT(AVG(review_star), 2) FROM review WHERE restaurant_seq = #{restaurantSeq} AND review_status = "active"
